txt.en: Khûtra Elder Roshat has asked for your help culling the rising population of the dead near the Mâkhda Khorbo. The ruins of the Mâkhda Khorbo can be found in the hills to the east of Khûtra.
Defeat spirits near the Mâkhda Khorbo ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Elder Roshat in Khûtra
'You have my thanks again. There was a rising tide of dead washing close to Khûtra. Because of you, my people can walk the pathways around Khûtra without fear.'
'Please hurry and take the fight to the dead. My people long to move freely outside Khûtra.'
Defeated wights near the Mâkhda Khorbo ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated spirits near the Mâkhda Khorbo ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated decayed near the Mâkhda Khorbo ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Elder Roshat in Khûtra
Return to Elder Roshat in Khûtra.
'You have my thanks again. There was a rising tide of dead washing close to Khûtra. Because of you, my people can walk the pathways around Khûtra without fear.'
Khûtra Elder Roshat has asked for your help culling the rising population of the dead near the Mâkhda Khorbo.

'It is fortunate that you are going out near the Mâkhda Khorbo. The dead have been getting more plentiful by the day. They are harrowing our merchants and folk passing to Umbar. If you could cull some of their number, you would have my thanks.'
Defeat decayed near the Mâkhda Khorbo ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You have my thanks again. There was a rising tide of dead washing close to Khûtra. Because of you, my people can walk the pathways around Khûtra without fear.'
'Please hurry and take the fight to the dead. My people long to move freely outside Khûtra.'
